txt.en:
'While the Gh창sh-hai prove to be a potent foe, they too have leaders, and theirs made his way into the Grand Stair some time ago.

'The Gh창sh-hai tend to gather near flame. When you make your way to the Grand Stair, search for a source of flame, and there you will find their leader, Gothghaash.

'Find him and destroy him, so that we might more easily remove the foe from the Grand Stair. Travel north-east from the Orc-watch to find the entrance to the Grand Stair.'
'With the head of the tribe removed, we should be able to keep the power of the Gh창sh-hai at bay. This news is very good, [placeholder].\n\n'We shall reclaim the Grand Stair in no time.'
'Be prepared to face a foe at home in the flame. Seek Gothghaash within the confines of the Grand Stair to the north-east of the Orc-watch.'

Deep within the halls of Moria, flames lick out of oily pools. It is here that the Gh창sh-hai make their home. A faction of these is aligned with the master of Moria, Mazog, and has come to the Grand Stair to pay tribute to their leader.
Gothghaash can be found within the Grand Stair, north-east of the Orc-watch.\n\nOssur told you of Gothghaash, the leader of the Fire-orcs, and directed you to find and defeat him.
Talk to Ossur at the Orc-watch
Ossur is at the Orc-watch, south-west of the Grand Stair.\n\nYou should return to Ossur at the Orc-watch and tell him of your victory over Gothghaash.
